document_data.name: Tirumala
document_data.mainbody: '''Tirumala''' was a [[rakshasa]] who founded the city of [[Tirumala]] in the [[Beastlands]] and ruled as its rajah through the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Tirumala constructed their eponymous city upon the ruins of an old [[Durpar]]i settlement, and declared it to be a holy site.{{cite web |author=[[Ed Greenwood]] | url=https://web.archive.org/web/20221124212752/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1183344200298979328| title= Ed's Twitter |date=2019-10-13 |accessdate=2024-03-17}}

By the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, one of Tirumala's servants was a fellow rakshasa named [[Devang]], who had become a trusted vizier to the rajah of [[Estagund]] and helped to push Tirumala's interests.
